ARABIC: قَالَ سَوْفَ أَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبِّىٓ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I will ask my Lord to pardon you. He is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I will ask my Lord to forgive you," he replied, "for He is forgiving and kind."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "I shall pray to my Lord for your forgiveness, for He, and indeed He alone, is Ever Forgiving, Most Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "I shall ask my Lord to forgive you; He is All-forgiving and All-merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “I shall soon seek forgiveness for you from my Lord; indeed He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "I will ask my Lord for forgiveness for you, verily, He! Only He is the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: I will ask for you forgiveness from my Lord; surely He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Assuredly I will ask my Lord to forgive you; He is the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: I shall ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Lo! He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "I shall certainly ask my Lord to forgive you. Surely, He is the Most Forgiving and Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: presently I shall pray for forgiveness for you of my Lord; verily He! only He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘I shall plead with my Lord to forgive you; indeed He is the All-forgiving, the All-merciful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Soon will I ask my Lord for forgiveness for you: for he is indeed Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "I will ask my Lord for forgiveness for you, verily He! Only He is the Oft-Forgiving, the Most Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'I shall ask my Lord to forgive you. He is Forgiving, the Most Merciful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I will ask my Lord to forgive you. He is the Forgiver, the Most Merciful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:98] He said, ‘Assuredly I shall ask forgiveness for you of my Lord. Lo! He is the Forgiving, the Merciful’: he [Jacob] put off this [plea of forgiveness] until [the last hour] before dawn, in order to be closer to [the likelihood of] it being accepted, or [he put it off] until the eve of Friday. They then departed for Egypt, where Joseph and the senior courtiers came out to meet them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) to them: (I shall ask forgiveness for you of my Lord) I will pray to Allah for you on the night of Friday, at the end of dawn. (He is the Forgiving, the Merciful) towards those who repent.
